lead_paragraph: Liu Xiang of China set a world record in the 110-meter hurdles yesterday in Lausanne, Switzerland, breaking the mark he shared with Colin Jackson of Britain. Liu’s time of 12.88 seconds at the Athletissima Grand Prix meet was three-tenths of a second faster than the record he matched in winning a gold medal at the 2004 Olympics.
